message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hey Alice, $120 is a bit steep for me.  I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $85 right now.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $100. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $100 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go down to $90. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll sell the product to you for $105. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
